title: Jail Door, Sucre, Bolivia
marks:
Inscription and Label

on back, in black ink: [S
description: hand, mouth and chin of figure visible through a half-circle-shaped cutout in wooden door at right; crumbling wall at left
creditline: Gift of the family of Esther Parada:  Adam Wilson, son; Margo Davion and Susan Peters, sisters; and Benjamin Glaser, brother
